QuestData.Title: Archdruid of the Vale
QuestData.Description: Deep within our forest lies Moonclaw Vale.$b$bThere you will find a reclusive group of feral druids charged with the protection of Val'sharah from any that would seek to disrupt the balance of nature.$b$bThese druids are led by Thaon Moonclaw, the most fierce of the Archdruids.$b$bSeek him out. Let him know that Cenarius is in need of his aid.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Thaon Moonclaw in the Moonclaw Vale.
QuestData.RewardText: Cenarius will have my aid once my grove has been made safe.
